        public GridAffinityAssignmentCache(GridKernalContext ctx,
                                   String cacheOrGrpName,
                                   int grpId,
                                   AffinityFunction aff,
                                   IgnitePredicate<ClusterNode> nodeFilter,
                                   int backups,
                                   boolean locCache,
                                   boolean persistentCache)
        Constructs affinity cached calculations.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Kernal context.
        cacheOrGrpName - Cache or cache group name.
        grpId - Group ID.
        aff - Affinity function.
        nodeFilter - Node filter.
        backups - Number of backups.
        locCache - Local cache flag.

                                         @Nullable

                                         @Nullable
                                         DiscoCache discoCache)
        Calculates affinity cache for given topology version.
        Parameters:
        topVer - Topology version to calculate affinity cache for.
        events - Discovery events that caused this topology version change.
        discoCache - Discovery cache.
        Returns:
        Affinity assignments.
